content: Setup project structure and CMake build system for HAASP with libgit2 integration
Implement Git Service C++ class with libgit2 bindings for repository operations
Create QML GitPortal component for VS Code integration bridge
Setup Rust WebApp scaffold with Axum for Insights++ local TLS server
Configure Python Git Intelligence pipeline with code quality ML models
Create remaining QML components (Inspector, Hierarchy, Timeline)
